Description:
Detects suspicious PowerShell invocation with a parameter substring

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Daniel Bohannon (idea), Roberto Rodriguez (Fix)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious PowerShell Parameter Substring
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (process_path like '%\powershell.exe' or process_path like '%\pwsh.exe') and (command like '% -windowstyle h %' or command like '% -windowstyl h%' or command like '% -windowsty h%' or command like '% -windowst h%' or command like '% -windows h%' or command like '% -windo h%' or command like '% -wind h%' or command like '% -win h%' or command like '% -wi h%' or command like '% -win h %' or command like '% -win hi %' or command like '% -win hid %' or command like '% -win hidd %' or command like '% -win hidde %' or command like '% -NoPr %' or command like '% -NoPro %' or command like '% -NoProf %' or command like '% -NoProfi %' or command like '% -NoProfil %' or command like '% -nonin %' or command like '% -nonint %' or command like '% -noninte %' or command like '% -noninter %' or command like '% -nonintera %' or command like '% -noninterac %' or command like '% -noninteract %' or command like '% -noninteracti %' or command like '% -noninteractiv %' or command like '% -ec %' or command like '% -encodedComman %' or command like '% -encodedComma %' or command like '% -encodedComm %' or command like '% -encodedCom %' or command like '% -encodedCo %' or command like '% -encodedC %' or command like '% -encoded %' or command like '% -encode %' or command like '% -encod %' or command like '% -enco %' or command like '% -en %' or command like '% -executionpolic %' or command like '% -executionpoli %' or command like '% -executionpol %' or command like '% -executionpo %' or command like '% -executionp %' or command like '% -execution bypass%' or command like '% -executio bypass%' or command like '% -executi bypass%' or command like '% -execut bypass%' or command like '% -execu bypass%' or command like '% -exec bypass%' or command like '% -exe bypass%' or command like '% -ex bypass%' or command like '% -ep bypass%' or command like '% /windowstyle h %' or command like '% /windowstyl h%' or command like '% /windowsty h%' or command like '% /windowst h%' or command like '% /windows h%' or command like '% /windo h%' or command like '% /wind h%' or command like '% /win h%' or command like '% /wi h%' or command like '% /win h %' or command like '% /win hi %' or command like '% /win hid %' or command like '% /win hidd %' or command like '% /win hidde %' or command like '% /NoPr %' or command like '% /NoPro %' or command like '% /NoProf %' or command like '% /NoProfi %' or command like '% /NoProfil %' or command like '% /nonin %' or command like '% /nonint %' or command like '% /noninte %' or command like '% /noninter %' or command like '% /nonintera %' or command like '% /noninterac %' or command like '% /noninteract %' or command like '% /noninteracti %' or command like '% /noninteractiv %' or command like '% /ec %' or command like '% /encodedComman %' or command like '% /encodedComma %' or command like '% /encodedComm %' or command like '% /encodedCom %' or command like '% /encodedCo %' or command like '% /encodedC %' or command like '% /encoded %' or command like '% /encode %' or command like '% /encod %' or command like '% /enco %' or command like '% /en %' or command like '% /executionpolic %' or command like '% /executionpoli %' or command like '% /executionpol %' or command like '% /executionpo %' or command like '% /executionp %' or command like '% /execution bypass%' or command like '% /executio bypass%' or command like '% /executi bypass%' or command like '% /execut bypass%' or command like '% /execu bypass%' or command like '% /exec bypass%' or command like '% /exe bypass%' or command like '% /ex bypass%' or command like '% /ep bypass%')
